title: Hartek crosses 10 GW solar milestone
description: Hartek Group has surpassed 10GW of solar capacity through its power system, T&D, and Renewable EPC business units. The company has built EHV/HV substations up to 400 KV and is executing a 300 MW solar project. Hartek aims for 10,000 Cr revenue by 2030, reinforcing its commitment to a sustainable future.
